Klant: Good,I could not imagine it. Kluster, sir, you have to do something =
about that rude Maximal down in the CR Room! And your prisoners around here=
, they are tortured so much! Is that the way the Maximals do things around =
here?...

They see Torca talking to a young bot::

id?

=

tchet, right?  My dad's best friend?

to finally meet you all!  So, any idea what this meeting is 
  about?

y Lynx: No clue.

he meeting.

pedge: Thank you Deemos.
